name: this is hard for me
description:
I have been through some stuff.  Some rough, really not nice stuff. It sucks, but we grow and we become strong and good and all that, but even the king rat is still missing some toes from the early days when he had to fight for his dinner.

My missing king-rat-toes are my memories.

My hope is that you play this game and think “Hey, me too” or “so that’s how they feel”, or, at the very least, “that wasn’t nothing”.

But maybe you’ll think “that was nothing” or “that’s bull shit that’s not true to my experience” or “get out of your own asshole, guy” and that’s okay too. Not that you need permission to have an opinion, now I’m talking more to myself I think.

Anyways, have fun!

 ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ CONTROLS ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys - Move

Mouse - Look 

Click - Interact

Space - Jump

Esc - Pause

sounds taken from freesound.org

~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~

thanks for playing 

Leo & Eli ~ 2018
